narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bayada Home Health Care, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Blairsville, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $85.1M in Medicaid payments across 209K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $85.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
